TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HyperLinkField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField

summary.span: 表示将显示为数据绑定控件中的超链接的字段。

span.span: Represents a field that is displayed as a hyperlink in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件 ( 如和) 使用类来显示每个显示的记录的超链接。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display a hyperlink for each record displayed. 当用户单击某个超链接时, 该超链接会被定向到与该超链接关联的网页。When the user clicks a hyperlink, he or she is directed to the Web page associated with the hyperlink. 对象的显示方式取决于使用它的数据绑定控件。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如, 控件以列的形式显示对象, 而控件则将其显示为一行。For example, the control displays a object as a column, while the control displays it as a row. 若要指定要为超链接显示的标题, 请使用属性。To specify the caption to display for the hyperlinks, use the property. 使用 " 属性" 指定在单击超链接时要导航到的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to when a hyperlink is clicked. 如果要在特定窗口或框架中显示链接的内容, 请设置属性。If you want to display the linked content in a specific window or frame, set the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果设置了和属性, 则对象中的所有超链接共享相同的标题和导航 URL。When the and properties are set, all hyperlinks in the object share the same caption and navigation URL. 同样, 此属性也适用于所有超链接。Likewise, the property also applies to all hyperlinks. 或者, 您可以将对象绑定到数据源中的字段。Alternatively, you can bind the object to fields in a data source. 这允许您为对象中的每个超链接显示不同的标题, 并使每个超链接导航到不同的位置。This allows you to display a different caption for each hyperlink in the object and to have each hyperlink navigate to a different location. 若要将字段绑定到标题, 请设置属性。To bind a field to a caption, set the property. 若要创建用于导航的 URL, 请将属性设置为用于创建 url 的以逗号分隔的字段列表。To create a URL for navigation, set the property to a comma-separated list of fields to use to create the URL. 通过分别设置和属性, 可以指定标题和导航 url 的自定义格式。You can specify a custom format for the captions and navigation URLs by setting the and properties, respectively. 可以通过 将属性设置为来`false`隐藏数据绑定控件中的对象。You can hide a object in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 您可以自定义对象的页眉和页脚部分。You can customize the header and footer sections of a object. 若要在页眉或页脚部分显示标题, 请分别设置或属性。To display a caption in the header or footer sections, set the or properties, respectively. 若要在页眉节而不是文本中显示图像, 请设置属性。To display an image in the header section instead of text, set the property. 通过 `false`将属性设置为, 可以在对象中隐藏标头部分。 The header section can be hidden in the object by setting the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些数据绑定控件 (如控件) 只能显示或隐藏控件的整个标题部分。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 这些数据绑定控件不支持单个绑定字段的属性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual bound field. 若要显示或隐藏数据绑定控件的整个标头部分, 请使用控件的`ShowHeader`属性 (如果可用)。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control, use the control's `ShowHeader` property (if available). 还可以通过设置字段的不同部分的样式属性来自定义对象 (字体颜色、背景色等) 的外观。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出了不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |Style 属性Style property|说明Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||对象的子 Web 服务器控件的样式设置。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||对象的脚注部分的样式设置。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||对象的标头部分的样式设置。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||对象中数据项的样式设置。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象在控件中显示静态超链接的列。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to display a column of static hyperlinks in a control. 对象中的每个超链接分别共享和属性指定的相同标题和导航 URL。Each hyperlink in the object shares the same caption and navigation URL specified by the and properties, respectively. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/CS/hyperlinkfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/VB/hyperlinkfieldvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将对象绑定到数据源中的字段。The following code example demonstrates how to bind a object to fields in a data source. 和属性用于指定要分别绑定到对象中显示的每个超链接的标题和导航 URL 的字段。 The and properties are used to specify the fields to bind to the caption and the navigation URL, respectively, of each hyperlink displayed in the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/CS/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/VB/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringvb.aspx#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 当向动态创建的数据绑定控件添加字段时, 通常使用此构造函数。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要将对象动态添加到数据绑定控件, 请创建一个新的对象, 设置其属性, 然后将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。To dynamically add a object to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如, 如果使用控件, 请将对象添加到集合中。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 虽然可将字段动态添加到数据绑定控件, 但强烈建议根据需要静态声明字段, 然后将其显示或隐藏。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 静态声明所有字段可减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数将对象动态添加到控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldCtor/CS/hyperlinkfieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldCtor/VB/hyperlinkfieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将当前 对象的属性复制到指定对象。

span.span: Copies the properties of the current object to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由方法调用, 以将当前对象的属性复制到另一个对象。 The method is called by the method to copy the properties of the current object to another.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string[] DataNavigateUrlFields { get; set; }
.property instance string[] DataNavigateUrlFields
Public Overridable Property DataNavigateUrlFields As String()

member this.DataNavigateUrlFields : string[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源中字段的名称，用于为 对象中的超链接构造 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the names of the fields from the data source used to construct the URLs for the hyperlinks in the object.

value.span: 包含数据源中字段的名称的数组，用于为 中的超链接构造 URL。

span.span: An array containing the names of the fields from the data source used to construct the URLs for the hyperlinks in the .

value.span: 默认值为空数组，表明未设置 。

span.span: The default is an empty array, indicating that is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当数据源包含多个必须进行组合以创建对象的超链接的字段时, 请使用属性。Use the property when the data source contains multiple fields that must be combined to create the hyperlinks for the object. 在属性中指定的字段与属性中的格式字符串组合在一起, 以构造对象中的超链接。The fields specified in the property are combined with the format string in the property to construct the hyperlinks in the object. > [!NOTE] > 在 .aspx 文件中使用声明性代码设置属性时, 请使用以逗号分隔的字段名称列表。When you set the property with declarative code in an .aspx file, use a comma-separated list of field names. 您可以使用属性将超链接的 url 设置为静态值, 而不是使用此属性将超链接的 url 绑定到字段。Instead of using this property to bind the URLs of the hyperlinks to a field, you can use the property to set the hyperlinks' URL to a static value. 在此选项中, 每个超链接共享相同的 URL。With this option, each hyperlink shares the same URL. > [!NOTE] > 如果同时设置了 和属性, 则属性优先。If the and the properties are both set, the property takes precedence.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataNavigateUrlFormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string DataNavigateUrlFormatString
Public Overridable Property DataNavigateUrlFormatString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataNavigateUrlFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataNavigateUrlFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于指定格式的字符串， 对象中的超链接的 URL 将以此格式呈现。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the URLs for the hyperlinks in a object are rendered.

value.span: 用于指定格式的字符串， 中的超链接的 URL 将以此格式呈现。

span.span: A string that specifies the format in which the URLs for the hyperlinks in a are rendered.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表明没有对 URL 值应用特殊格式设置。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the URL values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性为对象中的超链接的 url 指定自定义格式。 Use the property to specify a custom format for the URLs of the hyperlinks in a object. 如果未设置该属性, 则超链接的 url 不会获得任何特殊格式。If the property is not set, the hyperlinks' URLs do not get any special formatting. > [!NOTE] > 仅当设置了属性时, 才应用格式字符串。The format string is applied only when the property is set. 格式字符串可以是任何文本字符串, 并且通常包含字段值的占位符。The format string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the field's value. 例如, 在格式字符串 "项目值: {0}" 中{0} , 占位符被替换为对象中的字段值。For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the {0} placeholder is replaced with the field's value in the object. 格式字符串的其余部分显示为文本文本。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字符串不包含占位符, 则不会在最终显示文本中包含来自数据源的字段值。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. 占位符由两部分组成, 用冒号分隔并括在大括号中, 格式为 {`A`:`Bxx`}。The placeholder consists of two parts, separated by a colon and wrapped in braces, in the form {`A`:`Bxx`}. 冒号前面的值 (`A`在常规示例中) 指定从零开始的参数列表中的字段值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the field value's index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此参数是格式设置语法的一部分。This parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 由于每个单元格中只有一个字段值, 因此此值只能设置为0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒号和冒号后的值是可选的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 冒号后面的字符 (`B`在常规示例中) 指定了值的显示格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出了常见格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|显示采用科学 (指数) 格式的数字值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|以固定格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以常规格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|以数字格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写, 但除外`X`, 后者在指定的情况下显示十六进制字符。The format characters are not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字符后的值 (`xx`在常规示例中) 指定要显示的有效位数或小数位数。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如, 格式字符串 "{0:F2}" 显示具有两个小数位的定点数。For example, the format string "{0:F2}" displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定要应用于对象中显示的超链接的导航 url 的自定义格式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom format to apply to the navigation URLs of the hyperlinks displayed in a object. 属性所指定的字段值作为查询字符串传递给在格式字符串中指定的网页。The value of the field specified by the property is passed as a query string to a Web page specified in the format string. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/CS/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/VB/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源中的字段的名称，此名称包含要为 对象中的超链接标题显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source containing the text to display for the hyperlink captions in the object.

value.span: 数据源中的字段的名称，此名称包含要为 中的超链接标题显示的值。

span.span: The name of the field from the data source containing the values to display for the hyperlink captions in the .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 " 属性" 指定字段的名称, 该字段包含要为对象中的超链接标题显示的文本。Use the property to specify the name of the field that contains the text to display for the hyperlink captions in the object. 您可以使用属性将超链接标题设置为静态值, 而不是使用此属性将超链接标题绑定到字段。Instead of using this property to bind the hyperlink captions to a field, you can use the property to set the hyperlink captions to a static value. 在此选项中, 每个超链接共享相同的标题。With this option, each hyperlink shares the same caption. > [!NOTE] > 如果同时设置了和属性, 则属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定数据源中要绑定到对象中显示的超链接标题的字段。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a field from the data source to bind to the hyperlink captions displayed in a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataBind/CS/hyperlinkfielddatabindcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataBind/VB/hyperlinkfielddatabindvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性设置绑定到对象中显示的超链接标题的值的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to format the values bound to the hyperlink captions displayed in a object. 值的格式设置为货币。The values are formatted as currency. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/CS/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/VB/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于指定格式的字符串， 对象中的超链接标题将以此格式显示。

span.span: Get or sets the string that specifies the format in which the hyperlink captions in a object are displayed.

value.span: 用于指定格式的字符串， 中的超链接标题将以此格式显示。

span.span: A string that specifies the format in which the hyperlink captions in a are displayed.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表明没有对这些超链接标题应用特殊格式设置。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the hyperlink captions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性为对象中显示的标题指定自定义的显示格式。 Use the property to specify a custom display format for the captions displayed in the object. 如果未设置该属性, 则将显示字段的值而不进行任何特殊格式设置。If the property is not set, the field's value is displayed without any special formatting. > [!NOTE] > 仅当设置了属性时, 才应用格式字符串。The format string is applied only when the property is set. 格式字符串可以是任何文本字符串, 并且通常包含字段值的占位符。The format string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the field's value. 例如, 在格式字符串 "项目值: {0}" 中{0} , 当字段显示在对象中时, 占位符将被替换为该字段的值。For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the {0} placeholder is replaced with the field's value when it is displayed in the object. 格式字符串的其余部分显示为文本文本。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字符串不包含占位符, 则不会在最终显示文本中包含来自数据源的字段值。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. 占位符由两部分组成, 用冒号分隔并括在大括号中, 格式为 {`A`:`Bxx`}。The placeholder consists of two parts, separated by a colon and wrapped in braces, in the form {`A`:`Bxx`}. 冒号前面的值 (`A`在常规示例中) 指定从零开始的参数列表中的字段值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the field value's index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此参数是格式设置语法的一部分。This parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 由于每个单元格中只有一个字段值, 因此此值只能设置为0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒号和冒号后的值是可选的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 冒号后面的字符 (`B`在常规示例中) 指定了值的显示格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出了常见格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|显示采用科学 (指数) 格式的数字值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|以固定格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以常规格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|以数字格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写, 但除外`X`, 后者在指定的情况下显示十六进制字符。The format characters are not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字符后的值 (`xx`在常规示例中) 指定要显示的有效位数或小数位数。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如, 格式字符串 "{0:F2}" 显示具有两个小数位的定点数。For example, the format string "{0:F2}" displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性设置绑定到对象中显示的超链接标题的值的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to format the values bound to the hyperlink captions displayed in a object. 值的格式设置为货币。The values are formatted as currency. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/CS/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/VB/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string NavigateUrl { get; set; }

Public Overridable Property NavigateUrl As String

summary.span: 获取或设置当单击 对象中的超链接时定位到的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to navigate to when a hyperlink in a object is clicked.

value.span: 当单击 中的超链接时定位到的 URL。

span.span: The URL to navigate to when a hyperlink in a is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定在单击对象中的超链接时要导航到的 URL。 Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to when a hyperlink in a object is clicked. 设置此属性时, 每个超链接共享相同的导航 URL。When this property is set, each hyperlink shares the same navigation URL. 您可以使用属性将超链接的 url 绑定到数据源中的字段, 而不是使用此属性来设置超链接的 url。Instead of using this property to set the URL for the hyperlinks, you can use the property to bind the URLs of the hyperlinks to a field in a data source. 这使你可以为每个超链接使用不同的 URL。This allows you to have a different URL for each hyperlink. > [!NOTE] > 如果同时设置了和属性, 则属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定当单击对象中的超链接时要导航到的静态网页。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a static Web page to navigate to when a hyperlink in a object is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/CS/hyperlinkfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/VB/hyperlinkfieldvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Target { get; set; }
.property instance string Target
Public Overridable Property Target As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置目标窗口或框架，单击 对象中的超链接时，将在此显示链接到的网页。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in a object is clicked.

value.span: 单击 中的超链接时，在其中加载链接到的网页的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to load the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in a is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 " 属性" 指定在单击超链接时显示链接到该超链接的 Web 内容的窗口或框架。Use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a hyperlink when that hyperlink is clicked. 值必须以 A 到 Z 范围内的字母 (不区分大小写) 开头, 但下表中列出的特殊值除外, 其中每个值都以下划线开头。Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for the special values listed in the following table, each of which begins with an underscore. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine whether the `_search` value is supported. 例如, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 和更高版本支持`_search`目标值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later versions support the `_search` target value. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现`target`为属性。The property is rendered as a `target` attribute. XHTML `target` 1.1 文档`anchor`类型定义中不允许使用元素的属性。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 如果对象的呈现输出必须符合 XHTML 1.1, 请不要设置属性。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the object must be XHTML 1.1-compliant. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[Visual Studio 中的 XHTML 标准和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 创建可访问的网页时, 强烈建议你避免使用属性来面向其他窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [NIB：ASP.NET 可](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)访问性。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定要在其中显示与对象中的超链接关联的网页内容的目标窗口。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a target window in which to display the contents of the Web page associated with a hyperlink in a object. 单击超链接时, 将在新窗口中显示链接的网页。The linked Web page is displayed in a new window when the hyperlink is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/CS/hyperlinkfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/VB/hyperlinkfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要为 对象中的每个超链接显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display for each hyperlink in the object.

value.span: 要为 中的每个超链接显示的文本。

span.span: The text to display for each hyperlink in the .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定要为对象中的超链接显示的标题。 Use the property to specify the caption to display for the hyperlinks in a object. 设置此属性时, 每个超链接共享相同的标题。When this property is set, each hyperlink shares the same caption. 您可以使用属性将超链接标题绑定到数据源中的字段, 而不是使用此属性来设置超链接标题。Instead of using this property to set the hyperlink captions, you can use the property to bind the hyperlink captions to a field in a data source. 这允许您为每个超链接显示不同的标题。This allows you to display a different caption for each hyperlink. > [!NOTE] > 如果同时设置了和属性, 则属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 设置此属性后, 可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性为对象中的超链接指定要显示的静态标题。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a static caption to display for the hyperlinks in a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/CS/hyperlinkfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/VB/hyperlinkfieldvb.aspx#1)]
